admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
This project is designed to enhance the
            developmental role of IFCT and increase its support of the
            Government's industrial development strategy which
            emphasizes dispersion of investment in the provincial areas,
            and assistance to labor-intensive and export-oriented
            industries. The loan proceeds will be used to finance the
            foreign exchange costs of industrial subprojects; however,
            in the case of subprojects located more than 100 km from
            Bangkok, the loan may be used to finance 100% of IFCT's
            subloan, up to a maximum of 50% of total subproject costs,
            including some local costs. There are no special risks
            associated with the project; IFCT undertakes rigorous
            appraisal of projects prior to lending, and its exchange
            risk coverage agreement with the Government adequately
            protects IFCT against possible exchange risks.
